Subject: You have Been Issued a User Account
Body:
Dear [[User.Contact.Name.FirstName]],
Your User Account has been activated. Please find your credentials as below:
1. Username: [[User.UserName]]
2. Temporary password: [[User.UnHashedPassword]]
Note: Upon log-in, you will be prompted to change this password.
Please contact us in case of any difficulty.
Thank you,
Hello Payments Team

Subject: Your User Account has Been activated
Body:
Dear [[User.Contact.Name.FirstName]],
Your User Account has been activated. Please find your credentials as below:
1. Username: [[User.UserName]]
2. Temporary password: [[User.UnHashedPassword]]
Note: Upon log-in, you will be prompted to change this password.
Please contact us in case of any difficulty.
Thank you,
Hello Payments Team

Subject: Your Reseller System is Now Active
Body:
Dear [[Reseller.Contact.Name.FirstName]],
Your reseller system has been configured and is now active.
The reseller administrator will receive the login information for the system in a separate email. Once logged in, administrator can set up merchants in the system.
Thank you,
Hello Payments Team

Subject: Welcome  [[Provider.Contact.Name.FirstName]]:
Body:
Dear [[Provider.Contact.Name.FirstName]],
Your provider account is now active and you can start processing payments.
The provider administrator will receive the login information for the system in a separate email. Once logged in, administrator can begin processing payments.
Thank you,
HelloPatients
***Powered By HelloPatients***

Subject: Billing Invoice To Merchant
Body:
Dear Sir,
Please find your Invoice Details as below:
Invoice Date:[[BillingInvoice.InvoiceDate]]
Company Name:[[BillingInvoice.MerchantCompanyName]]
Merchant Name:[[BillingInvoice.MerchantName]]
Amount:[[BillingInvoice.Amount]]
Paid:[[BillingInvoice.Paid]]
Paid ON:[[BillingInvoice.PaidOn]]
Transaction Id: [[BillingInvoice.PaymentTransactionID]]
Thank you,
Hello Payments Team

Subject: You have Been Issued a User Account
Body:
Dear [[Contact_Name_FirstName]],
Your provider account has been activated and can be accessed by visiting https://admindev.hellopatients.com/#/login/[[ProviderUrlSuffixName]]
Please find below your username and one-time temporary password to login to your patient account:
1. Username: [[UserName]]
2. Temporary password: [[Password]]
Upon log-in, you will be prompted to change this password.
Your patients can access their account by visiting [[PatientUrl]]
For support, please feel free to contact us at support@HelloPatients.com at anytime.
Thank you,
HelloPatients
***Powered By HelloPatients***

Subject: [[providerName]] Login Credentials
Body:
Dear [[firstName]],

Thank you for visiting [[providerName]] .
Your patient account has been activated and can be accessed by clicking here . You will be able to login with the temporary password listed below, or by sending a one-time code via email and/or text message .*
Please find below your username and one-time temporary password to login to your patient account:
1. Username: Your Phone Number or Email Address
2. Temporary password: [[password]]
For support, please call us at [[providerPhone]] or email [[providerEmail]].
Thank you,
[[providerName]]
[[NoteLineOne]]
[[NoteLineTwo]]
[[PoweredBy]]

Subject: HelloPatients Password Reset
Body:
Dear [[User.Contact.Name.FirstName]],
Thank you for using the self-service password reset.
Please find below your one-time temporary password for your HelloPatients account:
Temporary password:[[User.UnHashedPassword]]
Please visit www.hellopatients.com and select Login. Upon log-in, you will be prompted to change this password.
For support, or if you did not request this, please contact us at support@HelloPatients.com at anytime.
Thank you,
HelloPatients

Subject: Password Reset
Body:
Dear [[User.User.Contact.Name.FirstName]],
Thank you for using the self-service password reset.
Your provider account password has been reset and can be accessed by clicking here. You will be able to login with the temporary password listed below.*
Temporary password:[[User.User.UnHashedPassword]]
For support, or if you did not request this, please contact us at support@HelloPatients.com at anytime.
Thank you,
[[User.ProviderName]]
[[User.NoteLineOne]]
[[User.PoweredBy]]

Subject: HelloPatients Password Reset
Body:
Dear [[User.Contact.Name.FirstName]],
Thank you for using the self-service password reset.
Your patient account password has been reset and can be accessed by clicking here HelloPatients. You will be able to login with the temporary password listed below, or by sending a one-time code via email and/or text message.*
Temporary password:[[User.UnHashedPassword]]

Please log onto https://hellopatients.com with your temporary password.
For support, or if you did not request this, please contact us at support@HelloPatients.com at anytime.
Thank you,
HelloPatients
*If using temporary password above, you will be prompted to change this password.
*For one-time code via text, reply STOP to end text messaging at anytime.

Subject: HelloPatients Forgot Password

For support, or if you did not request this, please contact us at support@HelloPatients.com at anytime.

Thank you,
[[ProviderName]]

Description: Patient account linked to new provider
Subject: Account linked to new provider
Body:
Dear [[FirstName]],
Thank you for visiting [[ProviderName]].
Your patient account has been activated and can be accessed by clicking here . [[ProviderName]] is a part of the HelloPatients network and you will now be able to access it by sending a one-time code via email and/or text message.*
Username: Your Phone Number or Email Address
Password: Request code
For support, please call us at [[ProviderPhone]] or email [[ProviderEmail]].
Thank you,
[[ProviderName]]
[[NoteLineOne]]
[[NoteLineTwo]]
[[PoweredBy]]

Description: Cancel Payment Plan by Provider Admin
Subject: Payment Plan Cancelled from [[ProviderName]]
Body:
Dear [[FirstName]],
Your payment plan has been cancelled on [[CancelledDate]]. If you did not approve of this, please email support@hellopatients.com immediately.
Please find more details about payment plan deleted below:
Name of provider: [[ProviderName]]
Payment Plan ID: [[PaymentPlanId]]
Date Cancelled: [[CancelledDate]]
No. of Remaining Payments: [[RemainingPayments]]
Remaining Balance: [[TotalDueAmount]]
Click here to login to your account .
Thank you,
HelloPatients

Body:
Dear [[User.User.Contact.Name.FirstName]],
Please find below your verification code to login to your patient account :
[[OTPNumber]]
This code will expire in 15 minutes.
{{#if (eq User.ProviderContactNumber "DEFAULT")}} If you did not approve this or for support, please contact us at email [[User.ProviderEmail]]. {{else}} If you did not approve this or for support, please call us at [[User.ProviderContactNumber]] or email [[User.ProviderEmail]].{{/if}}
Thank you,
[[User.ProviderName]]

Subject: OTP TEST
Body:
Dear [[User.Contact.Name.FirstName]],
Thank you for using the self-service forgot password.
Please find below your one-time temporary password for your HelloPatients account:
Temporary password:[[User.UnHashedPassword]]
Please visit www.hellopatients.com and select Login. Upon log-in, you will be prompted to change this password.
For support, or if you did not request this, please contact us at support@HelloPatients.com at anytime.
Thank you,
HelloPatients

Subject: Password Updated
Body:
Dear [[User.User.Contact.Name.FirstName]],
Your patient account password was updated on {{moment User.User.ModifiedOn format="MM/DD/YYYY"}} and can be accessed by clicking here . {{#if (eq User.ProviderContactNumber "DEFAULT")}} If you did not approve of this, please contact us at email [[User.ProviderEmail]]. {{else}} If you did not approve of this, please call us at [[User.ProviderContactNumber]] or email [[User.ProviderEmail]]. {{/if}}
Thank you,
[[User.ProviderName]]
[[User.NoteLineOne]]
[[User.NoteLineTwo]]
[[User.PoweredBy]]

Subject: Appointment with [[ProviderName]] Created
Body:
Dear [[FirstName]],
Your appointment has been scheduled with [[ProviderName]]. If you did not approve of this, please email [[ProviderEmail]] or call [[ProviderPhone]] immediately.

Please find more details about your appointment below:
Name of provider: [[ProviderName]]
Address: [[ProviderAddress]]
Date: [[Date]]
Time: [[Time]]
Practitioner: [[DoctorName]]
Frequency: One-Time
To edit your appointment, please call us at [[ProviderPhone]]. To view or cancel appointment, click here to login.
Thank you,
[[ProviderName]]
[[NoteLineOne]]
[[NoteLineTwo]]

[[PoweredBy]]

Subject: Password Reset Patient
Body:
Dear [[User.User.Contact.Name.FirstName]],
Thank you for using the self-service password reset.
Your patient account password has been reset and can be accessed by clicking here. You will be able to login with the temporary password listed below, or by sending a one-time code via email and/or text message.*
Temporary password:[[User.User.UnHashedPassword]]
{{#if (eq User.ProviderContactNumber "DEFAULT")}} For support, please contact us at email [[User.ProviderEmail]]. {{else}} For support, please call us at [[User.ProviderContactNumber]] or email [[User.ProviderEmail]]. {{/if}} ].
Thank you,
[[User.ProviderName]]
[[User.NoteLineOne]]
[[User.NoteLineTwo]]
[[User.PoweredBy]]

Subject: Notifications Settings Updated

[[phone]]
{{#if (eq providerPhone "DEFAULT")}} If you did not approve of this, please contact us at email [[providerEmail]]. {{else}} If you did not approve this or for support, please call us at [[providerPhone]] or email [[providerEmail]].{{/if}}

You can stop text notifications at anytime by clicking here and editing your settings or replying STOP via text.
Thank you,
[[providerName]]
[[noteLineOne]]

Subject: Form Submitted Through Public URL
Body:
Dear [[ProviderName]],
A patient has submitted a form to you from your site. Please find the details for the form submitted below:
Form Title : [[FormTitle]] Submission Date : [[CreatedDate]] Email : [[PatientEmail]] Mobile : [[PatientMobile]]
How to view form:
To view the form please log in to the provider portal and go to forms management under settings. From there click on the 3 dot menu and select "View Public Submissions."

If you did not approve of this, please call us at [[ProviderPhone]] or email [[ProviderEmail]] immediately.

Thank you,
[[ProviderName]]
